message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $95 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $110.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
I understand you're getting close to the price you're willing to pay, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair price, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay $100 for the product.
